post:
vps.Bitcable <-- Click!

Bitcable Virtual Private Servers!
That's right, and they're AWESOME.

We're releasing our brand new, SolusVM powered, fully virtualized KVM virtual private servers. With our KVM servers, you can forget about other servers bringing you down, since each VPS will be completely isolated.

Here's our introductory offer:
Sign up using the coupon code kvmkvmkvm and we'll take of 50% off your first invoice.

Enough talk, what are the plans?

Tera -- $8.00 / mo $4.00!
2 cores
256 MB RAM
150 GB Premium Bandwidth
12 GB RAID 10 Disk Space
1 IP address
Your choice of OS

Peta -- $16.00 / mo $8.00!
4 cores
512 MB RAM
300 GB Premium Bandwidth
25 GB RAID 10 Disk Space
1 IP address
Your choice of OS

Exa -- $32.00 / mo $16.00!
8 cores
1024 MB RAM
600 GB Premium Bandwidth
50 GB RAID 10 Disk Space
1 IP address
Your choice of OS

Extra IP: $2 / mo

Premium bandwidth? What does that mean?

We're powered by some of the best bandwidth providers available, including:
  • Savvis
  • Level3
  • Global Crossing
  • Comcast
  • AboveNet
  • XO
  • Cogent
  • HE
Test IP: 209.9.238.4
Test download: http://209.9.238.4/test.tgz

What hardware / datacenter do you use?

We're currently using server-grade Supermicro hardware along with the LATEST Sandy Bridge Xeon processors with ECC DDR3 RAM. We're also using RAID-10 hard drive arrays.

We colocate all of our equipment at a local (< 5 miles away!) Tier-III datacenter located in Ashburn, VA.

What operating systems can I install?

Your Bitcable VPS will come with a virtualized CD drive. We have a bunch of ISOs ready to be mounted, and we can add additional ISOs easily. Either install an OS yourself using VNC, or we'll gladly do it for you. Here's what we ship with:
  • Centos 5.6 i386 Net install
  • Centos 5.6 x86_64 Net install
  • Archlinux i386 Net install
  • Archlinux x86_64 Net install
  • Ubuntu 10.04 LTS i386
  • Ubuntu 10.04 LTS x86_64
  • Ubuntu 11.04 i386
  • Ubuntu 11.04 x86-64
  • Debian 6.0 i386 Net install
  • Debian 6.0 x86_64 Net install
Hm.. anything else?
  • 99.9% uptime, guaranteed.
  • NO overselling (do I even need to say it?)
  • 30 day money back guarantee*
  • The best support! (Obviously )
  • Almost instant activation (Trust me. We're fast.)
